feed.title: How to create a pull tester JAR

entry.title: How to create a pull tester JAR
entry.summary: In an email on August 5th, 2014, Mike Hearn mentioned that the default package repository Maven uses was not protected by SSL until recently. The new URL is now available via SSL, but users have to notify Maven about it. Hearn suggested that a new release where SSL is the default will be coming soon. He also filed a wishlist item regarding this issue on https://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MNG-5672 and a bug report for old Ubuntu versions of Maven on https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/maven/+bug/1352418.
